mapper.select: SELECT lno,lname, lorg, lfee, lclass, lreq, ldetail, lcut, linfo,la FROM license WHERE lno=#{lno}
mapper.insert: insert into license ( lname, lorg, lfee, lclass, lreq, ldetail, lcut, linfo,la) values (#{lname},#{lorg},#{lfee},#{lclass},#{lreq},#{ldetail},#{lcut},#{linfo},#{la})
insert into licenseclass (lno,lqclass) values ((select lno from license where lname=#{lname}),'필기')
insert into licenseclass (lno,lqclass) values ((select lno from license where lname=#{lname}),'실기')
insert into licenseclass (lno,lqclass) values ((select lno from license where lname=#{lname}),'1차')
insert into licenseclass (lno,lqclass) values ((select lno from license where lname=#{lname}),'2차')
insert into licenseclass (lno,lqclass) values ((select lno from license where lname=#{lname}),'단독')
mapper.select: SELECT l.lno, lname, lorg, lfee, lclass, lreq, ldetail, lcut, linfo,la,c.lqclass,c.lqno FROM license l,licenseclass c WHERE l.lno=c.lno AND l.lno=#{lno} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE license SET lname=#{lname}, lorg=#{lorg}, lfee=#{lfee}, lclass=#{lclass}, lreq=#{lreq}, ldetail=#{ldetail}, lcut=#{lcut}, linfo=#{linfo},la=#{la} WHERE lno=#{lno}
